title: 进入服务器时加载世界游戏崩溃
author: 悪い人
txt_content:
在进入1.12的mod服时，在加载世界，然后游戏崩溃




QQ图片20200405183756.png (128.88 KB, 下载次数: 0)

2020-4-5 19:35 上传










QQ截图20200405182951.png (10.79 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-5 19:36 上传





在尝试更换id，调内存以及java后还是没用







新建 ZIP 压缩文件.zip


2020-4-5 19:31 上传
点击文件名下载附件




54.39 KB, 下载次数: 3


log

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
xaero map
移除试一下呢

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
更新显卡驱动
ig75icd64.dll is part of Intel HD Graphics Drivers for Windows(R) and developed by Intel Corporation according to the ig75icd64.dll version information. ig75icd64.dll's description is " OpenGL(R) Driver for Intel(R) Graphics Accelerator " ig75icd64.dll is digitally signed by Microsoft Windows Hardware Compatibility Publisher.
